name: Swg.Explorer
body:
Swg.Explorer (v0.2) is a a simple archive (TRE file) viewer/explorer for Star Wars Galaxies.

![Screenshot](http://www.wxv.co.nz/Swg.Explorer/screenshot.png)

![Sample Export](http://www.wxv.co.nz/Swg.Explorer/skull.jpg)

![Sample Export](http://www.wxv.co.nz/Swg.Explorer/at_at_3.jpg)

![Sample Export](http://www.wxv.co.nz/Swg.Explorer/at_st.jpg)

### Features
- View multiple TRE archives in a single combined view
- View and preview media and data files; including EA Interchange File Format (IFF), and String Table Format (STF)
- Extract data files
- Export meshes (static and dynamic) to Collada (dae) model files
- Export string files to CSV text files

### Uses
- [Be.HexEditor](http://sourceforge.net/projects/hexbox/) by Bernhard Elbl
- [DDSLib](http://communistgames.blogspot.co.nz/2010/12/dds-from-file-on-xna-40.html) by Popescu Alexandru Cristian
- [NAudio](http://naudio.codeplex.com/) By Mark Heath
- [SharpZipLib](http://www.icsharpcode.net/opensource/sharpziplib/) by the ic#code team

### Credits
- [File Formats](http://home.earthlink.net/~xunil/) by Kenneth Sewell (XUnil)
- [TRE Explorer](http://wiki.modthegalaxy.com/TRE_Explorer) _(unofficial link)_ by Melva I'Tah
- [SWGEMU](http://www.swgemu.com/) and its community

### Download
- [Binaries](http://www.wxv.co.nz/Swg.Explorer/Swg.Explorer.zip) _(source code available from links above)_
- Requires the [Microsoft XNA Framework Redistributable 4.0](http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=20914) to be installed.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
